content:
I'm trying to build a skeletal IG ---- the differentials are empty.
Here is the IG -- https://github.com/saulakravitz/carin-bb/tree/saul

Failure: template = hl7.davinci.template#current
Works: template = fhir.base.template#current

I use the Davinci template successfully on Plan-Net.
Thoughts?

BTW: Where are the templates in github, and if one wanted to adapt the DaVinci template for another project (by changing the logo), is that straightforward?
Depends on your scope and if you are in a hurry.
soon we should have some documentation to quickly adjust the template to add a logo and change colors
I assume you started with the sample IG?

https://github.com/HL7/ig-template-davinci
Though you should only derive from ig-template-base if it's a non-HL7 IG. If it's an HL7-specific IG (e.g. a different accelerator), then let us know what you're wanting to do, as we intend to control the HL7-specific templates pretty tightly.
Thx....Any thoughts on why the IG builder crashes and burns with the davinci template and succeeds with the fhir.base template?
not enough sacrifice to the sun gods?

I suspect your IG would fale with the ig-template-hl7 too. That template imposes additional requirements, such as having a link to the web page for the responsible work group. The crash-and-burn should be spitting out an appropriate error message...
